text:
May 7, 1955
Mr. Lewis Hill
c/o Radio Station IOTA
Berkeley, California
Dear Mr. Hill*
Mr. Harold E. Hill asked roe to write you, inquir¬
ing as to whether or not you had insured the recorder and type¬
writer we received early in March.
We find that the machine (the typewriter) is in
need of repair and it is our opinion that it was damaged in the
course of shipment. If you have any information, any papers,
etc. we would be pleased to hear from you as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
Winifred Coatney (Mrs.)
Secretary
#
